module.name: cleverppc
module.displayName: Ads on Google (Google Shopping + Dynamic Remarketing)
module.description: Get your Google Ads campaigns (Search, Display, Dynamic Remarketing and Google Shopping) all in one module! In addition, if your account complies with Google’s requirements, you will receive a promotional code for up to 120€ to spend on your campaigns!
module.author: Clever Ecommerce
module.confirmUninstall: Are you sure you want to uninstall? You will lose all your Clever Google Adwords campaigns.
